bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The Smith and Norford families lived in Albemarle County, Virginia.
J. Mason Smith was Albemarle County Sheriff from 1922-1951.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a copy of the book Norford Family History, 1742-1965, Memoirs from England-United States by William Lindsay Norford. Book is inscribed "William Abbott Smith, Purchased October 1965." Also included is a photograph J. Mason Smith, Sheriff of Albemarle County, 1947, and an application for search or certified copy of a certificate of birth for Robert Taylor Norford dated 1942.
